description: This file contains JavaScript code for the Enyo framework, including functions for executing unsafe local functions, managing resource loading (CSS and JS), dependency management, and runtime loading queue.

methods.name: enyo.execUnsafeLocalFunction
methods.description: Executes a function with restricted platform security, using MSApp on Windows 8 if available.

methods.name: enyo.machine.sheet
methods.description: Loads a CSS or Less stylesheet into the document, handling different loading methods.

methods.name: enyo.machine.script
methods.description: Dynamically loads a JavaScript file, with optional onLoad and onError callbacks.

methods.name: enyo.machine.inject
methods.description: Injects JavaScript code directly into the document.

methods.name: enyo.depends
methods.description: Loads dependencies such as scripts or stylesheets based on provided arguments.

methods.name: enyo.load
methods.description: Queues and manages runtime loading of dependencies, executing callbacks after loading.
